payload.name: sampling-aggregation
payload.title: Sampling + aggregation: mandatory at scale; policies must be risk-aware
payload.formal: logging everything is an economic DoS; sampling must preserve critical signals.
payload.apm2_mapping: classify telemetry by risk tier and data classification. High-risk events get durable evidence; low-risk gets sampled stats. Encode sampling policy as signed bundles (93) so enforcement is uniform.
